mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your dreams are our demands! Sign up today for exclusive VIP treatment and unlimited overdrafts.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, there I was, strolling into my favorite cafe, ready to order my usual triple-shot, non-fat, extra hot latte. But as I approached the counter, I overheard the barista telling a customer that they had run out of almond milk. Almond milk, can you believe it? My latte is nothing without almond milk-it's practically a crime to deny me my daily fix. So, without missing a beat, I dramatically dropped my phone on the floor, clutched my chest, and loudly declared, "This is an absolute travesty! How dare you deprive me of the elixir of life that is almond milk? I demand to speak to the manager this instant!"Within seconds, the manager appeared, looking flustered and apologetic. I launched into a tirade about the importance of customer satisfaction and the absurdity of running out of such a crucial ingredient. The other customers were staring, the barista was cowering, but I stood my ground, adamant that my almond milk latte would materialize before me.After some frantic scrambling, the manager miraculously found a hidden stash of almond milk in the back fridge. As my beloved latte was finally handed to me, I took a triumphant sip, relishing in the victory of asserting my entitlement. And as I strutted out of that cafe, latte in hand, I knew that standing up for what I deserved was always worth it.
